articles.title: Solar Storm Spectacle: Colorful Auroras Light Up Earth's Atmosphere - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Curtains of colorful light danced across the sky after solar storms sent energized particles crashing into Earth’s upper atmosphere. In early November 2023, sky watchers across North America and Europe posted photos on social media of dazzling displays of the…
articles.content:
ByEmily Cassidy, NASA Earth ObservatoryNovember 13, 2023
Satellite image of aurora over western Canada, captured by the VIIRS (Visible Infrared Imaging Radiometer Suite) sensor on the NOAA-NASA Suom… [+7107 chars]
